tool_description: Detect fraud in real time by checking IPs reputation, Proxy/VPN/TOR , BOT, and more...
name: FraudSentinel
title: FraudSentinel

api_list.name: FraudSentinel

utterances.utterance: Check the fraud status of IP address 192.168.1.1.
Is the IP 203.0.113.5 associated with any proxy or VPN?
Verify if IP 10.0.0.2 is flagged for any suspicious activity.
Run a detailed fraud check on IP 172.16.254.1 without using cache.
Is IP 198.51.100.10 known for bot activity?
Perform a paranoid level check on IP 203.0.113.15.
Check if IP 192.0.2.0 is listed in any fraud databases.
Check the IP 192.0.2.255 for any fraud indicators with paranoid mode enabled.
